author: Tyler Conway
title: Stephen Curry Discusses COVID-19 with Dr. Anthony Fauci in Instagram Q&A Session
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, joined  Stephen Curry  on Instagram for a live question and answer session regarding the COVID-19 pandemic...
content:
Alex Brandon/Associated Press
Dr. Anthony Fauci, the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, joined Stephen Curry on Instagram for a live question and answer session regarding the COVID-19 pandemic.
